name: Just Keep Running (Timothy A. Chatman)
description:
How quickly can you complete this course?  can you go the distance? Do you even know how to reach your goal? Lets see if you do. Just keep running is a first person platformer that will challenge you to find your way to the end of the track,  its harder than you think. All you need to do is Just keep running.

Credits:

Developer: Timothy A. Chatman

Assets from:

Universal Sound FX by Imphenzia

Ultimate game music collection by John Leonard French

Unity Standard assets by Unity Technologies

Probuilder by Unity Technologies

Progrids by Unity Technologies
